[Light Step](/Feats.aspx?ID=568) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 186 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

---

You aren’t bothered by tricky footing. When you Stride or Step, you can ignore difficult terrain.
name: Light Step
